Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Rename PnL columns and improve webhook processing

- Rename recentPnl30dUsd â†’ recentPnl30dBase in database schema
  * Column now accurately reflects base currency \(SOL\) instead of misleading USD name
  * Created SQL migration: migrations/fix_pnl_column_names.sql
  * Updated Prisma schema and all code references

- Unify PnL calculation across codebase
  * All PnL values stored in base currency \(SOL\)
  * Frontend converts SOL â†’ USD for display using current price
  * Consistent naming: recentPnl30dBase \(SOL\), recentPnl30dUsdValue \(calculated\)

- Improve webhook normalization and logging
  * Added detailed error logging in normalizeQuickNodeSwap
  * Better debugging for missing trades
  * Increased backfill limit from 10 â†’ 50 for all wallets

- Code changes:
  * repositories/smart-wallet.repository.ts: Updated field names and mappings
  * routes/smart-wallets.ts: Fixed PnL calculation and comments
  * services/lot-matching.service.ts: Updated incremental PnL updates
  * services/metrics-calculator.service.ts: Renamed recentPnl30dUsd â†’ recentPnl30dBase
  * services/solana-collector.service.ts: Enhanced error logging
  * workers/backfill-cron.ts: Increased limit for better trade coverage

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Refactor signal system to focus on 3 core types with tier system

ACTIVE SIGNAL TYPES \(Core Signals Only\):
- Conviction Buy: 2-5x+ larger trades \(EXTREME/STRONG/MEDIUM tiers\)
- Accumulation: Gradual position building \(2-4+ buys over time\)
- Exit Warning: Multiple smart wallets selling \(CRITICAL/WARNING tiers\)

KEY IMPROVEMENTS:
1. Tier System Implementation
   - CONVICTION: EXTREME \(5x+\), STRONG \(3x+\), MEDIUM \(2x+\)
   - ACCUMULATION: STRONG \(4+ buys\), MEDIUM \(3 buys\), WEAK \(2 buys\)
   - EXIT_WARNING: CRITICAL \(3+ wallets\), WARNING \(2+ wallets\)
   - Each tier has specific thresholds for score, size, and timeframes

2. Minimum Absolute Size for Conviction
   - EXTREME: 5 SOL minimum
   - STRONG: 2 SOL minimum
   - MEDIUM: 1 SOL minimum
   - Prevents low-value trades from triggering high-multiplier signals

3. Enhanced Exit Warning
   - Now calculates average seller score
   - Tier-based action recommendations
   - Better Discord notification filtering

4. Updated Signal Flow
   - Only core signals \(consensus, accumulation, conviction-buy, exit-warning\) sent to Discord
   - Deprecated signals \(whale-entry, early-sniper, momentum, re-entry, hot-token, volume-spike\) kept for backward compatibility but not actively called

5. Discord Notification Filtering
   - BUY signals: consensus, accumulation, conviction-buy
   - SELL signals: exit-warning
   - All deprecated types excluded from Discord

CONSENSUS signals are handled separately in consensus-webhook.service.ts

DEPRECATED \(not actively used\):
- Whale Entry, Early Sniper, Momentum, Re-entry, Hot Token, Volume Spike
- Detectors remain in code for potential future use but are not called
- Legacy thresholds preserved for backward compatibility

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add database schema for wallet correlation clusters

Add WalletCorrelation and SharedTradeIndex tables for detecting trading clusters.
This enables enhanced consensus signals when correlated traders buy together.

SCHEMA CHANGES:
- WalletCorrelation table: Tracks correlation metrics between wallet pairs
  * sharedTrades, overlapPercent, avgTimeDiffMinutes
  * jointSuccessRate, profitCorrelation
  * clusterStrength \(0-100 composite score\)
  
- SharedTradeIndex table: Denormalized fast lookup for shared trades
  * Avoids expensive joins when calculating correlations
  * Stores trade pairs with timing and PnL data

- SmartWallet model: Added correlationsAsA/B relations

MIGRATION:
- migrations/add_wallet_correlation_tables.sql
- Creates tables with proper indexes and foreign keys
- Ready for incremental correlation updates

NEXT STEPS:
- Implement WalletCorrelationService \(incremental updates\)
- Add cluster detection to consensus signals
- Create ðŸ’ŽðŸ’Ž CLUSTER Signal type \(blue Discord embed\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(/bin/bash -c '
# First 25 addresses
ADDRESSES=$\(cat /Users/stepanpanek/Desktop/Coding/Bots/tradooor/wallets.csv | tail -n +2 | head -25 | cut -d"";"" -f2 | sed ""s/^/\\""/;s/$/\\""/"" | tr ""\\n"" "","" | sed ""s/,$/\\n/""\)

echo ""Testing with 25 addresses...""
curl -s -X PUT ""https://api.helius.xyz/v0/webhooks/71ab9643-4aa4-4546-bbfa-502778326573?api-key=9cfb2e97-39ce-44ce-86e0-326b608060e8"" \\
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\
  -d ""{\\""webhookURL\\"":\\""https://tradooor.stepanpanek.cz/api/webhooks/helius\\"",\\""transactionTypes\\"":[\\""SWAP\\""],\\""accountAddresses\\"":[$ADDRESSES],\\""webhookType\\"":\\""enhanced\\""}""
')

Bash(/bin/bash -c '
# Create JSON file with first 25 addresses
cat > /tmp/helius_webhook.json << EOF
{
  ""webhookURL"": ""https://tradooor.stepanpanek.cz/api/webhooks/helius"",
  ""transactionTypes"": [""SWAP""],
  ""accountAddresses"": [
EOF

cat /Users/stepanpanek/Desktop/Coding/Bots/tradooor/wallets.csv | tail -n +2 | head -25 | cut -d"";"" -f2 | while read addr; do
  echo ""    \\""$addr\\"","" >> /tmp/helius_webhook.json
done

# Remove last comma and close JSON
sed -i """" ""$ s/,$//"" /tmp/helius_webhook.json
echo ""  ],"" >> /tmp/helius_webhook.json
echo ""  \\""webhookType\\"": \\""enhanced\\"""" >> /tmp/helius_webhook.json
echo ""}"" >> /tmp/helius_webhook.json

cat /tmp/helius_webhook.json | head -30
')

Bash(/bin/bash -c '
echo ""=== Helius Webhooks Summary ===""
for id in 71ab9643-4aa4-4546-bbfa-502778326573 4be2b617-c881-43e4-bdce-a2e692276f61 5f2253e9-901a-4057-a4fd-39779c5babae b1cdc210-6336-4d5d-ae40-4636fb12e228; do
  count=$\(curl -s ""https://api.helius.xyz/v0/webhooks/$id?api-key=9cfb2e97-39ce-44ce-86e0-326b608060e8"" | jq "".accountAddresses | length""\)
  echo ""Webhook $id: $count addresses""
done
echo """"
echo ""Total webhooks: 4""
')

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add NINJA signal for micro-cap fast consensus

NINJA Signal parameters:
- MCap: $5K - $20K \(micro-cap territory\)
- Time window: 3 minutes \(fast consensus\)
- Min liquidity: $3K
- Max price pump: +50% from first buy
- Stop Loss: -25% \(tighter for risk\)
- Take Profit: +50% \(quick exit\)

Features:
- Purple color \(0x8b5cf6\) and ðŸ¥· emoji
- Separate from CONSENSUS \(>= $20K MCap\)
- Optimized for early entry on new tokens

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && psql ""$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d \\""\)"" -c ""
SELECT 
  \\""tokenSymbol\\"",
  round\(\\""marketCapUsd\\""::numeric / 1000, 1\) as mcap_k,
  \\""blockReason\\"",
  \\""walletCount\\"",
  \\""requiredWallets\\"",
  \\""tier\\""
FROM \\""SignalGateCheck\\""
WHERE \\""createdAt\\"" >= CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY \\""createdAt\\"" DESC
LIMIT 20;
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT 
  \\""tokenSymbol\\"",
  round\(\\""marketCapUsd\\""::numeric / 1000, 1\) as mcap_k,
  \\""blockReason\\"",
  \\""walletCount\\"",
  \\""requiredWallets\\"",
  \\""tier\\""
FROM \\""SignalGateCheck\\""
WHERE \\""createdAt\\"" >= CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY \\""createdAt\\"" DESC
LIMIT 20;
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT 
  \\""blockReason\\"",
  COUNT\(*\) as cnt
FROM \\""SignalGateCheck\\""
WHERE \\""createdAt\\"" >= ''''2026-01-03'''' AND \\""createdAt\\"" < ''''2026-01-04''''
GROUP BY \\""blockReason\\""
ORDER BY cnt DESC
LIMIT 15;
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT COUNT\(*\) as total_trades,
       COUNT\(CASE WHEN side = ''''BUY'''' THEN 1 END\) as buys,
       MIN\(\\""timestamp\\""\) as first_trade,
       MAX\(\\""timestamp\\""\) as last_trade
FROM \\""Trade\\""
WHERE \\""timestamp\\"" >= ''''2026-01-03'''' AND \\""timestamp\\"" < ''''2026-01-04'''';
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT side, COUNT\(*\) 
FROM \\""Trade\\""
WHERE \\""timestamp\\"" >= ''''2026-01-03'''' AND \\""timestamp\\"" < ''''2026-01-04''''
GROUP BY side;
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 10000 THEN ''''<10K''''
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 20000 THEN ''''10-20K''''
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 30000 THEN ''''20-30K''''
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 40000 THEN ''''30-40K''''
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 50000 THEN ''''40-50K''''
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 75000 THEN ''''50-75K''''
    WHEN \(meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric < 100000 THEN ''''75-100K''''
    ELSE ''''100K+''''
  END as mcap_range,
  COUNT\(*\) as trades
FROM \\""Trade\\""
WHERE \\""timestamp\\"" >= ''''2026-01-03'''' 
  AND \\""timestamp\\"" < ''''2026-01-04''''
  AND LOWER\(side\) = ''''buy''''
  AND meta->>''''marketCapUsd'''' IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT 
  tok.\\""symbol\\"",
  COUNT\(DISTINCT t.\\""walletId\\""\) as unique_wallets,
  MIN\(\(t.meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric\) as min_mcap,
  MAX\(\(t.meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric\) as max_mcap,
  MIN\(t.\\""timestamp\\""\) as first_buy,
  MAX\(t.\\""timestamp\\""\) as last_buy
FROM \\""Trade\\"" t
JOIN \\""Token\\"" tok ON t.\\""tokenId\\"" = tok.id
WHERE t.\\""timestamp\\"" >= ''''2026-01-03'''' 
  AND t.\\""timestamp\\"" < ''''2026-01-04''''
  AND LOWER\(t.side\) = ''''buy''''
  AND \(t.meta->>''''marketCapUsd''''\)::numeric >= 50000
GROUP BY tok.\\""symbol\\""
HAVING COUNT\(DISTINCT t.\\""walletId\\""\) >= 2
ORDER BY unique_wallets DESC, max_mcap DESC
LIMIT 15;
""')

Bash(ssh -i ~/.ssh/claude_assistant root@157.180.41.49 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd /opt/tradooor/apps/backend && DB=$\(grep ""^DATABASE_URL="" .env | cut -d= -f2- | tr -d ""\\"""" | sed ""s/?.*//"" \) && psql ""$DB"" -c ""
SELECT 
  \\""tokenSymbol\\"",
  \\""marketCapUsd\\"",
  \\""blockReason\\"",
  \\""walletCount\\"",
  \\""requiredWallets\\"",
  \\""tier\\"",
  \\""walletGatePassed\\"",
  \\""allGatesPassed\\"",
  \\""createdAt\\""
FROM \\""SignalGateCheck\\""
WHERE LOWER\(\\""tokenSymbol\\""\) LIKE ''''%marlee%''''
ORDER BY \\""createdAt\\"" DESC
LIMIT 20;
""')
